sentences.en: Ballpoint needles are used to sew fine knits tricot s.
sentences.cn: 圆头针用来缝制高档针织精编织物.

sentences.en: Ballpoint needles permit ease in stitching knits.
sentences.cn: 圆头针可以轻松地缝制编织品.

sentences.en: Can you give me two refill of each color for the ballpoint pen?
sentences.cn: 能不能请给这支圆珠笔每种颜色配两根替换笔芯?

sentences.en: He snapped the cap on his ballpoint.
sentences.cn: 他吧嗒一声把笔帽扣在了圆珠笔上。

sentences.en: I changed the ink cartridges in my ballpoint pen.
sentences.cn: 我换了圆珠笔里的墨水芯.

sentences.en: I rummaged all the drawers before I found my ballpoint pen.
sentences.cn: 我翻遍了所有的抽屉才找到我的圆珠笔.

sentences.en: I would like to buy a ballpoint of this kind.
sentences.cn: 我想买一支这种圆珠笔.

sentences.en: If you twist the shaft in one way it becomes a ballpoint pen.
sentences.cn: 如果你以某种方式转动笔杆，它就变成了一支圆珠笔。

sentences.en: It was only blue ink ( ballpoint pen ) on slightly yellow paper.
sentences.cn: 这仅是用蓝色的原子笔画在淡黄色的纸上而已.

sentences.en: Laptop, flash disk, a ballpoint pen, a pencil, a notebook, a pair of glasses, cell phone, charger, moisture lotion, … Oh, that is too much.
sentences.cn: 笔记本电脑，闪存，一致圆珠笔，一支钢笔，一本笔记本，一副眼镜，手机，保湿液，… 噢，太多了。

sentences.en: Miss Grant: Whose ballpoint pen is this?
sentences.cn: 格兰特小姐: 这是谁的圆珠笔?

sentences.en: On average, 100 people choke to death on ballpoint pens every year.
sentences.cn: 平均每年有100个人因为圆珠笔窒息而死.

sentences.en: Roll - on deodorant uses the alike technology as the ballpoint pen.
sentences.cn: Roll-on除 味剂采用的技能和圆珠笔相同.

sentences.en: Roll - on deodorant uses the same technology as the ballpoint pen.
sentences.cn: Roll -on除 味剂采用的技术和圆珠笔一样.

sentences.en: Suzanne: Ballpoint. And get blue, not black like last time, OK?
sentences.cn: 原子笔.而且要蓝色, 不要上次的黑色, 好 吗 ?

sentences.en: There is an overflow of cheap ballpoint pens in the market.
To mouse proof your house, check all small openings with a ballpoint pen - if it fits the hole, it will let mice in.
sentences.cn: 要使你的房子里没有小老鼠，用圆珠笔来检查下所有的小洞，如果圆珠笔能放进去的话，那小老鼠就可能钻进去。

sentences.en: You can buy the ballpoint pen anywhere.
sentences.cn: 你到哪儿都能够买到这种圆珠笔.

trans.tran_en: a pen with a ball at the end that rolls ink onto the paper
